meaning_str.bing:
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；受刺激的；紧张不安的
v. “excite”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 感到激动的；感到兴奋的；激昂的

激动的；兴奋的；受刺激的；紧张不安的
感到激动的；感到兴奋的；激昂的

兴奋的；激动的；热情的；活跃的；充满活力的；受刺激的；已激发的
激发；使兴奋；使激动；兴奋；刺激；引起；引发；激励；使激动；（excite的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: It was time for me to be off work yesterday afternoon and I was a little excited because an easy weekend would be start soon!
1.cn: 昨天下午下班的时候，想到轻松的周末马上就要开始，心里都有点儿激动了！

2.en: We just have to see how it goes and like I said everybody's excited for the new season and we have to fight for every competition.
2.cn: 我们只是来看看它究竟怎样，就像我说的每个人都为新赛季感到兴奋，我们要争取每一场胜利。

3.en: When he extended his arms in front of him in the heavy rain, I was excited, AT that moment, I saw the faith win the darkness.
3.cn: 当他伸出了在大雨中张开双臂，我激动极了，那一刻，我看到了信心战胜黑暗。

0.en: Right, we're not supposed to get all excited about this opening tonight.
0.cn: 好的，开张之夜咱们不该这么兴奋的。

1.en: Oh, sure. She was probably up all night excited about the party she knows is happening.
1.cn: 喔，当然，他昨晚知道要办一个派对就兴奋的睡不着。

2.en: Everyone is excited to be playing a pirate game. Hello, Grandpa Pig. We are on our way. Jolly good.
2.cn: 每个人都很兴奋的想要玩这个海盗游戏。你好，猪爷爷，我们要出发了。非常好。非常好。

3.en: I'm sad about it, but I know they're going to turn up somewhere else, so, I'm kind of excited about going on a boat.
3.cn: 虽然我很沮丧，但我知道它们会在某个地方再出现，所以我对于要坐船走还挺兴奋的。

4.en: Think of how excited he's gonna be when we go out and surprise him. Plus we get to have our own, ani-Vegas-ary. A-Nevadaversary.
4.cn: 到时我们突然出现，他一定很兴奋的，而且我们自己还有拉斯维加斯纪念日，内华达纪念日！

5.en: And here is what he's so excited about. It's America's newest auto plant, a billion-dollar state-of-the-art facility filled with all of the latest technology.
5.cn: 这是他非常兴奋的一点，这是美国最先进的汽车化计划，价值大约十亿，配备了最先进的科技成果。

6.en: But I thought I'd be more excited.
6.cn: 我以为自己会更兴奋呢。

7.en: Hi, we are so, so excited about this.
7.cn: 你好，我们现在超级激动。

8.en: Oh, being excited isn't a guarantee of anything.
8.cn: 兴奋也不能保证什么啊。

10.en: So, do you want the gig? Wait, really? I'm so excited! Well, I'm so excited!
10.cn: 那么，你接受这份工作吗？等等，真的吗？我太激动了！我也很激动！

11.en: Don't get all excited, okay? I promise to not be excited! I used to think hope was for suckers.
11.cn: 别激动，好吗？我保证不激动！我以前认为希望是给弱者的。

12.en: Honey, she's upset. You're her boyfriend. You have to at least try to be excited by the things she's excited by.
12.cn: 亲爱的，她生气了，你是他男朋友，你至少也该试着为她高兴的事而高兴吧。

13.en: The children are very excited to meet you, Your Majesty. I'm excited to meet all of you. And now, for Miss Rabbit's medal.
13.cn: 孩子们见到你非常兴奋，女王陛下！我见到你们也很兴奋，这是兔子小姐的奖牌！

14.en: The children are very excited to meet you, Your Majesty. I'm excited to meet all of you. And now, for Miss Rabbit's medal.
14.cn: 孩子们见到你非常兴奋，女王陛下！我见到你们也很兴奋，这是兔子小姐的奖牌！

15.en: Oh, I would love too. Yeah? Oh, she'd be so excited.

16.en: It's my first day back at work. I'm excited. Sure. Sure?
16.cn: 今天是我第一天回去上班，我很激动。当然啦。当然啦。

17.en: So are you excited about your first night away from Emma?
17.cn: 你很高兴你第一次可以离开艾玛 晚上出去玩吗？

18.en: No I'm having fun. I'm really, excited for you and Ursula.
18.cn: 我觉得很开心。我为你跟乌苏拉感到高兴。

19.en: Now for some good news. We are very excited All right, Don.
19.cn: 现在，好消息，我们感到非常兴奋。好吧，唐。
